about_the_game: This DLC does not give you anything. This is a donation, and 100% of the money will be put back into this game, or into the other projects I am working on. I do not believe in IAP's for skins, extra tracks, "play time" and other such petty things. This is why my game is a one-time purchase and why I have this "DLC". I will be working to make this game have more variety. Specifically; more vehicles, environments, more events during gameplay, and more supported platforms including mobile. From there, profits will be put towards new games I hope you will all look forward to. Thank you all for your support, thank you!
detailed_description: This DLC does not give you anything. This is a donation, and 100% of the money will be put back into this game, or into the other projects I am working on. I do not believe in IAP's for skins, extra tracks, "play time" and other such petty things. This is why my game is a one-time purchase and why I have this "DLC". I will be working to make this game have more variety. Specifically; more vehicles, environments, more events during gameplay, and more supported platforms including mobile. From there, profits will be put towards new games I hope you will all look forward to. Thank you all for your support, thank you!
name: Eurobi Racing: Donationware

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Honestly Probably anything
  • Processor: If it can run Google Chrome you're good
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not required
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i9 9900k or better
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: This DLC is a donation, and does not give anything upon purchase. 100% of donations are put back into the game, or towards other projects. I hope to update this game regularly for the span of a few months as well as bring it to other devices, and every donation will get us closer to that goal.
